series: AI Universe Neural Networks - Pure Visual
originalPrompt:
Create a stunning visualization of planets functioning as massive thought nodes!

Show planetary systems where each planet serves as a cosmic neuron processing thoughts:
- Planets glowing with neural processing energy
- Orbital patterns creating synaptic connection networks
- Planetary surfaces showing neural activity patterns
- Moon systems functioning as neural satellites
- Beautiful energy exchanges between planetary thought centers

Visual elements:
- Planets with glowing neural activity across their surfaces
- Orbital patterns creating beautiful synaptic networks
- Energy flows between planets showing thought processing
- Planetary neural surfaces with flowing pattern activity
- Moon systems as neural support networks
- Beautiful cosmic neural processing in solar system scale
- Sense of planets as massive thinking entities

Pure planetary neural visualization - no text anywhere!
Focus on planets as cosmic neurons and thought processors!
revisedPrompt: Visualize a cosmic scene where planets function as massive thought nodes, or cosmic neurons. Each planet should be glowing with energy implying neural activity. These glowing planets should be connected with each other through orbital patterns that resemble complex synaptic networks. The energy flowing between these planets indicates thought processing. Observe the planetary surfaces featuring ever-changing neural activity patterns. The moons of each planet act as neural satellites or supporting networks to the main 'planetary brain'. The entire scene should represent a beautiful and vast cosmic neural processing system at the scale of a solar system. Avoid including any text within the scene.
